Reviews.Title: Don't go by the "Frequently Bought Together" suggestion!
Reviews.Author: Shadow Ferret
Reviews.Content: The camera itself is a great deal, however, it comes with a 4gb micro-memory card. Do NOT go by the "Frequently Bought Together" suggestion Amazon posts with this camera. It suggested a "Transcend 16GB Class 10 SDHC Flash Memory Card (TS16GSDHC10E) $12.95" so I clicked the "Add Both to Cart." When the items arrived, it turns out the Transcend 16gb is a HUGE memory card, the size of a postage stamp and totally useless with this camera. So I had to ship it back. Not sure why Amazon would list these items together like this when they clearly don't go together.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: J. Darden
Reviews.Content: Needed a more compact camera for travel.  Chose because of size and features.  Received and set up.  Very excited about all of the different possibilities and uses for this camera.  Haven't had a chance to put all features to the test but my initial testing was very impressive.  I believe I made the best choice.

Reviews.Title: The pictures are good, it is easy to use.
Reviews.Author: PW "PW"
Reviews.Content: The pictures are good, and it is easy to use.  I like the WIFI feature a lot that it can sync with my Samsung Galaxy phone or share the pictures via facebook, etc.  With its 10X zoom without a view finder, It is a bit hard to find and zoom into a distant object using the screen, it just takes longer time for the LCD display to show it.  But overall, I am happy with the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great Cam!
Reviews.Author: Maria Carolina Aced
Reviews.Content: Got it a few days ago! Havent tried all the features but seems very cool! And pics are great. Brings a case with zipper and aa 4 gb sd card. Go for it!

Reviews.Title: purchased as a gift
Reviews.Author: queenme
Reviews.Content: as far as I know the recipient has enjoyed it! and it says 10 more words are required, there you go!

Reviews.Title: Wow!
Reviews.Author: Kathryn M. Wasileski
Reviews.Content: Pretty amazing little camera. It works well with my Galaxy tablet. I have just begun to learn about all the amazing things it can do! So far, it has been easy to use. I tried the panoramic feature, and it was so easy with great results.  I also tried the email feature, and it, too, worked well. Who ever thought I'd be sending emails with a tiny camera!

Sensor Resolution:16.1 Megapixel
AE/AF Control:Face-priority AF, Subject-tracking AF
AV Interfaces:Composite video/audio
Digital Video Format:H.264
Optical Sensor Size:1/2.3"
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung ST200F Digital Camera, 16.0 MP, 27mm 10X Zoom (Red)
